item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description: It's really nice, I love it. Makes getting in and out of the car a cinch
item.content:encoded: It’s really nice, I love it. Makes getting in and out of the car a cinch

item.title: By: Adam
item.dc:creator: Adam
item.description: Nice tilt hub! Very cool. I considered one of those quite a few times before doing the slim one I ended up with.
item.content:encoded: Nice tilt hub! Very cool. I considered one of those quite a few times before doing the slim one I ended up with.

item.title: By: Kent
item.dc:creator: Kent
item.description: so far, so good bro! om nom nom. OMP wheel looks awesome. i could only assume the way it feels is just as good. =P
item.content:encoded: so far, so good bro! om nom nom. OMP wheel looks awesome. i could only assume the way it feels is just as good. =P
